lines: ### 180  GA RE TSEBE NAKO
АН 400 CH 540
WE KNOW NOT THE HOUR
Gare tsebe nako ye Moren'a tlago,
Mme ditšhupo di šupa gore o kgauswi;
Ge a bowa ke tšhepiso yeo e thabišago,
Ga re tsebe nako;
Pušološo:
O tlo tla... A re emeng re loke,
O tlo tla... haleluya, haleluya,
O tla ka maru kgalalelong ya Tate,
Ga re tsebe nako,
Lesedi le gona go boa ba nyakago poloko,
Nnete e gona pukung ya kutullo ya Jeso ,
Le boporofeta bo šupa nako yela,
Ga re tsebe nako;
Re tlo rapela re tšhubile mabone,
Re lete mošomong Morena a be a tle,
Re opele lethabong re hlokometše
Ditšhupo, Ga re tsebe nako;
